name: Tortoise and the Hare
description:
Help the Tortoise win the race!

Use whatever you can find in the game world to help the Tortoise or hinder the Hare. 

Use WASD to move, Shift to run, "f" to interact, and "1" to complete dialogue.

This project was created for a class on level design. Students were tasked with taking a fairy tale and making it into a level. We were not able to write any code for this project and had to use the assets that the professor provided.
